ACM/ICPC WF å¤§ç‰›ï¼Œä½œä¸ºä»–çš„åŒäº‹åª.message: ACM/ICPC WF genius, as his colleague can only tremble and admire

æœ‹å‹å°±åƒå£è¢‹é‡Œçš„ç¡¬å¸ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æ»¡æ.message: Friends are like coins in your pocket, they don't need to be full, just high quality and valuable.

çœŸæ­£çš„æœ‹å‹ä¼šåœ¨ä½ å¿˜è®°æºå¸¦ç¬‘é¢å.message: A true friend will hand you a smile coupon that can be used the next day when you forget to bring your smile mask.

ä¸æœ‹å‹ç›¸å¤„ï¼Œå°±åƒç”¨æ‰‹æœºï¼Œä¿¡å·ä¸.message: Getting along with friends is like using a cellphone. When the signal is weak, you don't change friends, you just find a better spot.

è®ºå·æ‡’çš„å…±çŠ¯ï¼Œä¸€ä½æ‡‚äº‹çš„æœ‹å‹è.message: A responsible friend is better than a dozen diligent assistants when it comes to being lazy partners.

å¥½å‹åƒæ˜¯ç”Ÿæ´»çš„è°ƒæ–™åŒ…ï¼Œå°‘äº†ä»–.message: Friends are like seasoning packets in life, without them, even a five-star meal becomes tasteless.

æœ‹å‹å°±åƒæ˜¯åŒé‡é¦…é¥¼ï¼šä¸€å±‚æ˜¯æ¬¢ç¬.message: Friends are like double-layered pies: one layer is laughter, and the other layer is the person who secretly records videos of you when you're happy and carefree.

å¥½å‹ä¹‹é—´çš„å¯¹è¯å°±åƒæ˜¯å¯†ç é”ï¼Œåˆ«.message: Conversations between friends are like a combination lock, sounding like Morse code to others.

ä¸€ä¸ªçœŸæ­£çš„æœ‹å‹ä¼šåœ¨ä½ æ„šè ¢è¡Œä¸.message: A true friend will clap for you in the front row of your foolish behavior and be ready with the first inappropriate joke.

æœ‹å‹æ˜¯é‚£ä¸ªçŸ¥é“ä½ æ‰€æœ‰ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼Œä½†.message: A friend is someone who knows all your flaws but still refuses to publicly auction off that information.

æœ‹å‹å°±åƒæ˜¯ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸­çš„å¼¹å‡ºå¹¿å‘Šï¼Œ.message: Friends are like pop-up ads in life, you don't remember subscribing to them, but they always appear on time.

ä¸€èµ·åœ¨å¨æˆ¿åˆ¶é€ æ··ä¹±å’Œçƒ¹é¥ªç¾éš¾.message: Creating chaos and cooking disasters together in the kitchen is an unwritten rule of friendship.

æœ‹å‹ä¼šåœ¨ä½ å†³å®šå‰ªä¸ªæ–°å‘å‹åï¼Œè¯š.message: A friend will honestly tell you that you look like a runaway sheep when you decide to get a new hairstyle.

æœ‹å‹å°±åƒå½©è™¹ï¼Œå½“ä½ çš„ç”Ÿæ´»è¢«æš´.message: Friends are like rainbows, they appear and draw a smiley face when your life is in chaos due to a storm.

æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‹å‹å°±åƒæ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ´»ç”Ÿ.message: Having a friend is like having a living memo, constantly reminding you of all the embarrassing details from the past.

ä¸æœ‹å‹å…±é¥®ä¸€æ¯ï¼Œå“ªæ€•æ˜¯éš¾å–çš„è‡.message: Sharing a drink with a friend, even if it's a poorly made homemade one, is better than enjoying the best wine in the world alone.

æœ‹å‹æ˜¯é‚£ç§ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä»»ä½•æ— èŠçš„æ´.message: Friends are the kind of people you can be bored together with in any boring activity, even waiting in line for a bus becomes fun.

æœ‹å‹ä¸æ˜¯äº’ç›¸å¹æ§çš„é•œå­ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯é‚£.message: Friends are not mirrors that flatter each other, but partners who can mock each other's appearance together.

åœ¨æˆ‘æ— èƒ½ä¸ºåŠ›æ—¶ç»™æˆ‘ç”µå½±ç¥¨çš„æ.message: A friend who gives me a movie ticket when I feel helpless is much better than someone who gives me inspirational quotes.

æœ‹å‹ä¸ä¼šè®©ä½ åšå‚»äº‹â€¦â€¦è‡³å°‘ä¸ä¼.message: Friends won't let you do stupid things... at least not alone.

æœ‹å‹æ˜¯ä¼šåœ¨ä½ ç©¿æ–°é‹çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç”¨.message: A friend is someone who will step on your new shoes with force and then innocently say, 'Oh, sorry, I didn't see them.'

ä»ä¸­å­¦åˆ°å¤§å­¦çš„åŒå­¦ï¼ŒSJTU è¾©è®ºé.message: Classmates from middle school to university, one of those eloquent people in the SJTU Debate Team :P

è®¤è¯†è®¸ä¹…çš„ç½‘å‹ï¼ŒæŒç»­ä¸“æ³¨äº Qt.message: A longtime online friend who continues to focus on the field of Qt

å¶ç„¶æœç´¢åˆ°çš„åšå®¢ï¼Œçƒ­çˆ±è½¯ä»¶æŠ€æ.message: A blog discovered by chance, maintained by a doctor who loves software technology, serving as a cross-disciplinary knowledge base.

åŒæ ·åœ¨ 2023 å¹´é‡å¯äº†è‡ªå·±åšå®¢çš„ç½.message: A netizen who also restarted their blog in 2023, met through the community of SSPAI.
